title: Festival of kites
creator_contributor_role: The City of Darebin, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Australia - Social life and customs

abstract: Preston - Short video documenting the Festival of Kites 2001
description: Sponsored by the City of Darebin, this short video documents the Festival of Kites, organized by the North Eastern Melbourne Chinese Association and by the Australian Kite Association. An all-day event held in parklands in Preston, this multicultural event includes performances by comedians, Indian dancers and a Chinese Choir.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2000166; MAP compile loops 1 & 2; Active; 2002
